Package io.crums.sldg.bags

Interface RowBag

All Superinterfaces:
io.crums.util.hash.Digest
All Known Subinterfaces:
MorselBag
All Known Implementing Classes:
CachingRowPack, DbMorselBuilder, MorselPack, MorselPackBuilder, RecurseHashRowPack, RowPack, RowPackBuilder
public interface RowBag
extends io.crums.util.hash.Digest

A bag of rows. The general contract is that if a row's input hash is known, then the row hashes the row links to are also known.

Return values are read-only. Excepting buffers (which carry positional state), this means return values are immutable.

  • Method Details

    • rowHash

      java.nio.ByteBuffer rowHash​(long rowNumber)
      Returns the row-hash for the row at the given number. The eligible input arguments are both from the full row numbers and also the row numbers of rows they reference.
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - a member of Ledger.coverage(getFullRowNumbers()) (note this includes row 0, where the sentinel hash must be returned)
      Returns:
      32-byte hash

    • inputHash

      java.nio.ByteBuffer inputHash​(long rowNumber)
      Returns the input hash for the row at the given number. The eligible input arguments are those by getFullRowNumbers().
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - one of the full-row-numbers
      Returns:
      32-byte hash

    • getFullRowNumbers

      java.util.List<java.lang.Long> getFullRowNumbers()
      Returns the row numbers for which full rows in this bag can be constructed.
      Returns:
      non-null, not empty, strictly ascending list of positive row numbers
      See Also:
      getRow(long)

    • lo

      default long lo()
      The lowest (full) row number in the bag, or 0 if empty.
      Returns:
      ≥ 0

    • hi

      default long hi()
      The highest (full) row number in the bag, or 0 if empty.
      Returns:
      ≥ lo()

    • hasFullRow

      default boolean hasFullRow​(long rowNumber)
      Determines if full (hash) information is available for the row with the given number.
      Returns:
      Collections.binarySearch(getFullRowNumbers(), rowNumber) >= 0
